description: Learn how to program your own HTML5 and native Android games with beginner to advanced programming tutorials. The series will use Java, using tools like Google Web Toolkit (GWT), and Android SDK. For a refresher series of GWT tutorials for beginners, check out my playlist http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGJDCzBP5j3yheWxkEdJCDAhzYxpudejx
